EmailTemplate.name: Web-based EMS Software_0313.Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Attending Our Webinar: Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for Your Interest Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} for your interest in our webinar: Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
We hope you find the information useful and would love to hear additional ideas on topics that you would be interested in hearing. Simply email cheri.lane@tritech.com with your ideas. You can access the recording and presentation slides from the webinar using these links:
Recorded Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/thwcrhj
Presentation Slides: http://www.tritechems.com/documents/March13Webinar.pdf
You may also be interested in viewing this EMS1.com interview on web-based software: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-CdXqYEvP00
Want to see more? Check out other educational webinars here: http://www.tritechems.com/TriTech-University/Webinars.asp
Thank you, TriTech Software Systems
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
